column5: In the heart of family neighborhood with paved sidewalks and short walk to: - 10+ miles of paved walking trails / greenbelt - Public and Lit at night tennis courts - Children playground and outdoor grills for picnics  Easy access (~10-15 minutes) to: - Toyota HQ's, Cowboys Training Facilities, Nebraska Furniture Mart, Liberty Mutual Call Center, FedEx HQ's, T-Mobile, JCPenny, State Farm HQ's, Galleria Mall - Cities of Frisco, Plano, Addison, The Colony, Lewisville, Coppell
column8: Updated Near Frisco, Plano, Dallas, Colony.
